results.name: Number of distinct prime divisors of 88...881 (with n 8's).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..203
example: The number of distinct prime divisors of 81 is 1.
The number of distinct prime divisors of 881 is 1 (prime).
The number of distinct prime divisors of 8881 is 2.
results.author: _Parthasarathy Nambi_, Apr 28 2005
